template.name: New Daydream
template.description: Creates a new Daydream service component, for use on devices running Android 4.2 and later.

parameter.name: Interactive?
parameter.help: Whether or not the Daydream is interactive. Touching anywhere on a non-interactive Daydreams dismisses it.

parameter.name: Fullscreen?
parameter.help: Whether or not the Daydream should be in fullscreen mode (in which case system UI will be hidden).

parameter.name: Bright Screen?
parameter.help: Whether or not the screen should be bright when this Daydream is running. The screen will be dim otherwise.

parameter.name: Configuration Activity
parameter.help: Whether or not to generate an associated settings Activity.
